article_title: Focus on innovation: Virginia Tech and Carilion to build research hub in Roanoke
article_text:

og.description: Virginia Tech expects to move hundreds of undergraduate and graduate students to Roanoke as it creates a medical hub with Carilion Clinic that poises the partners to become powerhouses in understanding and treating specific diseases.
